Difficulty Notes: Swap magic item and draw card.
Question: At 3 actions left in hand but limited essences, is passing early beneficial if it grants First Player and lets you swap to Transmutation?
Answer: Yes, if the extra card and Transmutation enable a 4 Gold burst next round.
Rationale: First to pass gains token (1 VP) and better magic item plus card.:contentReference[oaicite:74]{index=74}:contentReference[oaicite:75]{index=75}
game_state_description: Player low on resources; Transmutation available in supply.
